article_title: When Your Government Thinks You're Dead

article_metadata.author: Dan Diamond

og.description: Your government doesn't know for sure if you're alive or dead. That's the key takeaway from a new 60 Minutes report, which found that Social Security wrongly labels at least nine thousand living Americans as deceased every year — while millions of long-dead Americans are mistakenly listed as still alive, leading [...]
